p: NsW2 was tested against triazole-resistant yeasts with decreased susceptibility to statins. Thionin showed moderate activity against Sacharomyces. cerevisiae 77S, Cryptococcus laurentii 801M, and Candida krusei 1447N ( Table 4). It is worth noting that C. glabrata 1402m was not sensitive to this compound. All other cultures tested were suppressed by the addition of the NsW2 peptide. The inhibition zones were similar to AmB.
